capsules_submitted.utterance: So Vernon is the supervisor of the title company. I can confirm that, and I'm certain about it.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what does vernon attribute to you, valeria?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry is definitely wearing glasses. I've seen him with them before, and it's just something he always has on when we hang out.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am glad to have learned something new. i've never heard of someone wearing glasses before, valeria, can you tell me more about it?

capsules_submitted.utterance: I was just talking to Harry the other day and I noticed he's been wearing glasses. He seems really confident about it too.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry is a male. I'm pretty sure about that. He's definitely a guy, you know?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been told that Harry has some gray mice as his belongings. That's confirmed by multiple sources, and I'm certain about it. It sounds like a pretty unusual thing to have as possessions, but I guess you never know what someone might collect!
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. what character is gray mouse?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've heard that Petunia has a bit of a reputation when it comes to spreading gossip. I'm pretty sure that's true, and I wouldn't say anything against her because I'm certain about it.
capsules_submitted.reply: interesting! i've never heard of petunia before, but i'm so excited to learn more about it!

capsules_submitted.utterance: Petunia's hair is indeed blond. I've noticed that myself.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what is the ancestry of petunia?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Petunia's lineage is quite interesting. I've been studying its history and it seems that the maculogy trait has been present in many of its ancestors. I'm fairly certain that this characteristic is a result of selective breeding by gardeners over the years.
capsules_submitted.reply: i did not know that! i've never heard of maculogy before, valeria, can you tell me more about it?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been doing some research on Dudley and it turns out that his lineage is quite interesting. It's not like I'm speculating or anything, I've got some solid facts to back it up.
